snippet.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire for a Weekend
snippet.description:
How to Live Like a Millionaire for a Weekend
By Greg Emerson 12:25 PM EDT 08/04/11
Everyone deserves a taste of the good life. Here's how to make that a reality, if only for a few days.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11210531/1/how-to-live-like-a-millionaire-for-a-weekend.html

snippet.title: 10 Reasons to Stop Being a Jerk and Drink a Fruit Beer
snippet.description:
10 Reasons to Stop Being a Jerk and Drink a Fruit Beer
By Jason Notte 08:30 AM EDT 05/16/13
You'll throw a withered lime into a Corona, but won't try a beer brewed with apricot? Time to rethink that.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11925239/1/10-reasons-to-stop-being-a-jerk-and-drink-a-fruit-beer.html

snippet.title: Lessons From 8 Business-Savvy Celebrities
snippet.description:
Lessons From 8 Business-Savvy Celebrities
By Jason Notte 09:30 AM EST 02/23/11
